author: Amy Furr
title: Publix Buys Excess Produce, Milk from Florida Farmers to Donate to Food Banks During Pandemic
description: The Publix supermarket company is offering a helping hand to its community in Lakeland, Florida, during the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
The Publix supermarket company is offering a helping hand to its community in Lakeland, Florida, during the health crisis.
Wednesday, the company announced its initiative to buy over 150,000 pounds of produce and 43,500 gallons of milk from local farmers and… [+2183 chars]
